revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:Sector_SetPlaneReflection}} {{OpenGL}}
{{Special|159|tag, floor, ceiling|Renderer}} * ''tag'': Tag of affected sectors * ''floor'': Amount of reflectiveness of the floor. 0 means none and 255 means fully reflective. * ''ceiling'': Amount of reflectiveness of the ceiling. 0 means none and 255 means fully reflective. Makes the tagged sector floors and/or ceilings reflective like mirrors. If used improperly this can reduce the frame rate quite drastically. You should keep the amount of reflective planes as small as possible.
